description: President Trump, standing next to Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, brought up the Oval Office meeting he had with Russian officials. Mr. Trump told reporters that he “never mentioned the word or the name Israel,” although it was never alleged that he revealed the source by name in the meeting.
title: Trump: I ‘Never Mentioned the Word Israel’ to Russians
title_page: Trump: I ‘Never Mentioned the Word Israel’ to Russians - Video - NYTimes.com
